translations: 倒退的；复归的；应继承的；将来应享有的

sentences.sentence: The technophiliac route forward would lead to a reversionary future.
sentences.translation: 这一技术狂路线会引领我们走向一个复古的未来。

sentences.sentence: The San Francisco poet Lew Welch captured the dark side of the Reversionary vision, in his rhapsodic manifesto Final City/Tap City.
sentences.translation: 旧金山诗人Lew Welch在他狂想曲一般的宣言《最终之城/自来水之城》中捕捉住了复古派愿景那阴暗的一面
